verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Here O my Lord
I see Thee Face to face
Here faith can touch
And handle things unseen

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Here would I grasp
With firmer hand Thy grace
And all my weariness
Upon Thee lean

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Here would I feed
Upon the Bread of God
Here drink with Thee
The royal wine of heav'n

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Here would I lay aside each
Earthly load
Here taste afresh
The calm of sin forgiv'n

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Mine is the sin
But Thine the righteousness
Mine is the guilt
But Thine the cleansing blood

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Here is my robe
My refuge and my peace
Thy blood Thy righteousness
Oh Lord my God

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
I have no help but thine
Nor do I need
Another arm save Thine
To lean upon

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
It is enough my Lord
Enough indeed
My strength is in Thy might
Thy might alone

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
This is the hour of banquet
And of song
This is the heav'nly table
Spread for me

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Here let me feast and
Feasting still prolong
The brief bright hour
Of fellowship with Thee

verse.name: v6a
verse.lines:
Too soon we rise
The symbols disappear
The feast tho not the love
Is past and gone

verse.name: v6b
verse.lines:
The bread and wine remove
But thou art here
Nearer than ever
Still our shield and sun

verse.name: v7a
verse.lines:
Feast after feast
Thus comes and passes by
Yet passing points
To the glad feast above

verse.name: v7b
verse.lines:
Giving sweet foretastes
Of the festal joy
The Lamb's great bridal-feast
Of bliss and love
